<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">3f245a1705a28210af5e078150724c96</macroponent><name>data_row_3_data</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "{0} out of 5",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    const input = api.data.evam_popular_articles.compositeDataViews;
    for (var i = 0; i < input.items.length; i++) {
        var model = input.items[i].propValues;
        if (model.model.rating != "") {
            model.detailValueTwo = helpers.translateSync("{0} out of 5", model.model.rating);
        }
    }
    return input;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-08 00:12:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>f3245a1790a28210a92c671fe5646e8a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>data_row_3_data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Consolidated Aircraft Logistics Management System" source="x_1284052_consol_0">62a761f4832242103fcc9cc0deaad379</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Consolidated Aircraft Logistics Management System">62a761f4832242103fcc9cc0deaad379</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_f3245a1790a28210a92c671fe5646e8a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-08 00:12:23</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
